arts.sum: Patrick Dorgu caught the eye in Manchester United's 4-1 win over Bournemouth in Chicago, with head coach Ruben Amorim lavishing praise on the promising wing-back

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola sends warning to the Premier League after watching Man United thrash his Bournemouth side in pre-season friendly
arts.sum: Goals from Rasmus Hojlund, Patrick Dorgu, Amad Diallo and Ethan Williams helped United to a 4-0 lead before a late own goal from Mattijs de Ligt saw the Cherries pull one back at Soldier Field.

arts.ttl: Man Utd put four past Bournemouth in Chicago even without new signings
arts.sum: Manchester United produced a dominant display in difficult conditions to beat Bournemouth 4-1 in the Premier League Summer Series in Chicago.

arts.ttl: How to watch Man Utd vs Bournemouth: TV channel, live stream and kick-off time
arts.sum: Manchester United and Bournemouth face off in the Premier League Summer Series mini-tournament in the United States on Thursday, as both sides ready themselves for the new season
